title: Document Synthesis of a New Compound
description: A medicinal chemist has synthesized a new compound and needs to document the process and register the molecule.

tasks.description: Draw the chemical structure of the newly synthesized compound.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses a chemical drawing tool to create the structure.

tasks.description: Register the new compound in the corporate compound registry.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the structure and the system assigns a unique registration number.

tasks.description: Document the multi-step synthesis procedure in the Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a detailed, step-by-step protocol in the ELN.

tasks.description: Upload the analytical data (e.g., NMR, mass spec) that confirms the structure and purity of the compound.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent attaches the analytical data files to the ELN entry for the new compound.
